Package extraction

Class RelationExtraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • extraction.RelationExtraction

  • public class RelationExtraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for managing the relation extraction, calling retrieveRelations(String, String). And starts a SpotlightThread and FoxThread and hands them the lines of the text file.
    Author:
    Nick Düsterhus, Lukas Blübaum, Monika Werner

        See Also:

      • properties

        protected static java.util.ArrayList<Relation> properties
        List of DBpedia ontology properties Relation

      • CHARACTERLIMIT

        private static final int CHARACTERLIMIT
        Limit of characters we send to Spotlight at once. If we sent more than that, Spotlight might not answer.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • graph

        private static org.apache.jena.rdf.model.Model graph
        The graph the triples will be written to.

      • parser

        private static NLPParser parser

    • Constructor Detail

      • RelationExtraction

        public RelationExtraction​()
        Initializes model and parser. If a properties.json file at the specified location exists, this file will be loaded. Otherwise the default ontology will be loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveRelations

        private void retrieveRelations​(java.lang.String input,
                               java.lang.String model)
        Reads the sentences/strings from the given file and puts them in two BlockingQueues. Creates a SpotlightThread and FoxThread, which then read the articles from their given BlockingQueue and try to extract triples.
        Parameters:
        input - Path to a text file like the wikipedia dump.
        model - Path to a Jena Model, the model will be created if it does not exist yet.

      • toJsonFile

        private void toJsonFile​()
        Writes the property List into a json file.

      • loadJson

        private void loadJson​()
        Reads a Json-file containing a List of Relations and puts them into a property list.

      • countOfRangeDomain

        private void countOfRangeDomain​()
        Adds the number of properties with exactly the same range and domain to each property.

      • parseProperties

        private void parseProperties​()
        Creates a List of properties from src/main/resources/ontology_english.nt . Extracts the label, uri, domain and range.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
